Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Requires the availability of hand sanitizer and toilet seat covers in all bathrooms
Summary: Requires the availability of hand sanitizer and toilet seat covers in all bathrooms in state-owned and state-leased buildings.
LawCode: Add ยง147, Pub Bldg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public buildings law, in relation to requiring the availability of hand sanitizer and toilet seat covers in all bathrooms
